question: Computers are often argued to be the most important invention of the last hundred years. To what extent do you agree or disagree with this statement?Give reasons for your answer and include any relevant examples from your own knowledge or experience.
text: Over the last centuries, computers have succeeded to be the most crucial creations in history. I believe that computers have become an indispensable tool since it supports us in various fields and also aids us to connect.

Initially, I agree with the statement that the computer has shown its significance by helping in our daily activities. This convenient device enables us to store data, make fast calculations and help us with our work. For example, it will only take a short period to finish an assignment by typing and sending it to the professor, we do not have to write it by hand and can only give it to the teacher when we go to school anymore. Furthermore, this smart technology also helps us to broaden our knowledge since it contains a great number of resources.

Some people believe that besides the computer, there are numerous innovations which are equally crucial. While there is some truth to this claim, there are further points to take into consideration regarding the unique ability of the computer which is connection. It gives us the ability to communicate with others people within a second. We can video chat with our family or friend when we are far away by several websites such as Zalo, and Facebook. Moreover, we are also able to chat with our international friend globally which aid us to understand and acknowledge the diverse cultures of our friend’s country.

In conclusion, it is undoubtedly that the computer is one of the greatest inventions of all time. Although there are other technology devices which are known as crucial also, the computer has proven to be the best one with its ability to help us not only in working and studying but also in connecting with other people.
